articles.title: Basketball star Brittney Griner sentenced to 9 years in Russian prison on drug charges - CBC Sports
articles.description: American basketball star Brittney Griner was sentenced to nine years in prison after being found guilty of drug possession and smuggling in Russian court on Thursday.
articles.content: U.S. basketball star Brittney Griner was convicted Thursday in Russia of drug possession and smuggling and was sentenced to nine years in prison in a politically charged case that could lead to a hig… [+7991 chars]
